summary.span: 提供用于创建、复制、删除、移动和打开文件的属性和实例方法，并且帮助创建 对象。

span.span: Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类的典型操作，如复制、 移动、 重命名、 创建、 打开、 删除和追加到文件。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to files. 如果您正在执行相同的文件上的多个操作，它可以是使用更加高效实例方法而不是相应的静态方法的类，因为安全检查将不一定总是需要。If you are performing multiple operations on the same file, it can be more efficient to use instance methods instead of the corresponding static methods of the class, because a security check will not always be necessary. 许多方法返回其他 I/O 类型，创建或打开文件时。Many of the methods return other I/O types when you create or open files. 您可以使用这些其他类型以进一步处理文件。You can use these other types to further manipulate a file. 有关详细信息，请参阅特定成员，如， ， ， ，或。For more information, see specific members such as , , , , or . 默认情况下，对新文件的完全读/写访问权限授予所有用户。By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users. 下表描述了用于自定义的各种行为的枚举方法。The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various methods. |枚举Enumeration|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||指定读取和写入访问的文件。Specifies read and write access to a file.| ||指定的文件，已在使用允许的访问级别。Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.| ||指定现有文件的内容是保留还是覆盖，以及请求创建的现有文件是否会导致异常。Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.| > [!NOTE] > 在接受路径作为输入字符串的成员，该路径必须是格式正确，或引发的异常。In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 例如，如果路径是完全限定名称，但以空格开头，在类的方法不修整路径。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class. 因此，该路径的格式不正确，并且会引发的异常。Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised. 同样的路径的组合不能完全限定两次。Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows"还会引发异常在大多数情况下。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases. 请确保使用接受一个路径字符串的方法时您的路径的格式是否正确。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 在接受一个路径的成员，路径可以引用的文件或只是一个目录。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路径也可以指相对路径或服务器和共享名称的通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，以下所有条件都可接受的路径：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - "MyDir\\\MySubdir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare"在 C# 中，或"\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 类提供了以下属性，使你能够检索有关文件的信息。The class provides the following properties that enable you to retrieve information about a file. 有关如何使用每个属性的示例，请参阅属性页。For an example of how to use each property, see the property pages. - 属性检索一个对象，表示文件父目录。The property retrieves an object that represents the parent directory of a file. - 属性检索文件的父目录的完整路径。The property retrieves the full path of the parent directory of a file. - 属性操作前检查文件是否存在。The property checks for the presence of a file before operating on it. - 属性获取或设置一个值，指定是否可以修改一个文件。The property retrieves or sets a value that specifies whether a file can be modified. - 检索文件的大小。The retrieves the size of a file. - 检索文件的名称。The retrieves the name of a file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一些主要成员`FileInfo`类。The following example demonstrates some of the main members of the `FileInfo` class. 当第一次检索属性时，调用的文件的方法和缓存信息。When the properties are first retrieved, calls the method and caches information about the file. 在后续调用中，必须调用以获取信息的最新副本。On subsequent calls, you must call to get the latest copy of the information. [!code-cpp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CPP/finfo class.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CS/finfo class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/VB/finfo class.vb#1)] 此示例生成类似于以下输出。This example produces output similar to the following. ``` Hello And Welcome C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70AB.tmp was copied to C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp. C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp was successfully deleted. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法打开一个文件，如果其中一个已存在的文件路径，或创建一个新文件，如果不存在。The method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist. 对于现有的文件，它不会不新将文本追加到现有的文本。For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text. 相反，它会用新的字符覆盖现有字符。Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters. 如果使用较短的字符串 （如"第二个运行"） （例如，"这是 OpenWrite 方法的测试）"覆盖更长的字符串，则文件将包含多种字符串 ("第二个 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (like "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method"). ## Examples 下面的示例打开文件进行写入，然后从文件中读取。The following example opens a file for writing and then reads from the file. summary.span: 将 对象所描述的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项应用于当前 对象所描述的文件。

span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the file described by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法适用于表示非继承的 ACL 列表的当前文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to the current file that represents the noninherited ACL list. 使用方法，无论何时需要添加或移除对文件的 ACL 条目。Use the method whenever you need to add or remove ACL entries from a file. > [!CAUTION] > 为 ACL 指定`fileSecurity`参数将替换现有文件 ACL。The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file. 若要添加新用户的权限，请使用方法以获取现有 ACL，对其进行修改，然后使用以将其应用到的文件。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use to apply it back to the file. ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到对给定文件的特定操作的权限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仅保持对象创建后修改的对象。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果尚未修改对象，它不会保存到文件。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，不能检索对象从一个文件，并对另一个文件重新应用相同的对象。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一种：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用方法来检索源文件中的对象。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 创建一个新目标文件的对象。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用或源方法对象来检索 ACL 信息。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用或方法以将信息复制到目标的步骤 3 中检索对象。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 设置目标对象与目标文件使用方法。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法和方法来添加，然后从文件删除的 ACL 项。The following code example uses the method and the method to add and then remove an ACL entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串方法表示传递给构造函数的路径。The string returned by the method represents path that was passed to the constructor. 当您创建对象使用的构造函数，方法返回的完全限定的路径。When you create a object using the constructors, the method returns the fully qualified path. 但是，也会通过返回的字符串的情况方法不表示完全限定的路径。However, there are cases where the string returned by the method does not represent the fully qualified path. 例如，创建对象使用方法，方法不表示完全限定的路径。For example, when you create a object using the method, the method does not represent the fully qualified path.
